body:
After discussion with @mozfreddyb, we realized that `frame-ancestors` gets applied to local resources, but the rest of the CSP does not.

We will have to find the proper source to put in that directive, or leave it empty to allow anyone to frame this site. Investigation continues, as I'm genuinely interested in finding the Right Way™️ of doing this.
